Uses of Package
nz.ac.auckland.integration.testing.resource

  • Packages that use nz.ac.auckland.integration.testing.resource 
    Package Description
    nz.ac.auckland.integration.testing  
    nz.ac.auckland.integration.testing.expectation  
    nz.ac.auckland.integration.testing.resource  
    nz.ac.auckland.integration.testing.specification  
    nz.ac.auckland.integration.testing.validator  
  • Classes in nz.ac.auckland.integration.testing.resource used by nz.ac.auckland.integration.testing 
    Class and Description
    HeadersTestResource
    Provides a mechanism for setting key/value pairs for message headers either as a mock response, or setting an expectation for the contents of a header.
    JsonTestResource
    Provides a mechanism for retrieving JSON values from a file/URL/String and also validating the response from a target service.
    PlainTextTestResource
    A simple mechanism for sending and comparing plain text values using the Java equals mechanism
    SoapFaultTestResource
    A way to specify a SOAP Fault to return back to the application under testing
    XmlTestResource
    Provides a mechanism for retrieving XML values from a file/URL/String and also validating a response from a target service.

  • Classes in nz.ac.auckland.integration.testing.resource used by nz.ac.auckland.integration.testing.resource 
    Class and Description
    StaticTestResource
    Used for retrieving static resources necessary for either sending values to an artifact under testing, or validating an expectation
    TestResource
    An interface for providing test resources for expectations or requests/inputs
    XmlTestResource
    Provides a mechanism for retrieving XML values from a file/URL/String and also validating a response from a target service.
